title: IFM in Talks to Raise $2 Billion Debt for Green Group Deal
description: IFM Investors Pty is in talks to raise about 1.6 billion Swiss francs ($2 billion) in debt to back its acquisition of Swiss data center operator Green Group AG, people with knowledge of the matter said.

title: Bezos' Blue Origin Successfully Lands Booster After Rocket Launch
description: Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin launched its New Glenn rocket from Florida into space and successfully landed its first-stage booster rocket on a barge in the Atlantic Ocean. It's a historic mission. The rocket will send two spacecraft on a trajectory toward Mars. The booster landing is key to Blue Origin’s goal of making New Glenn partially reusable. Recovered boosters would be recycled for multiple launches. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: The State of the Podcast Business, According to the People Shaping It
description: Industry leaders weigh in on everything from the middling allure of Netflix to the debatable impact of AI
